full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 500 NORTH LOS ANGELES Sisters File Number LOS ANGELES. CALIFORNIA 305 A29 253 711 Date NOTICE-IMMIGRATION BOND CANCELLED October 29, 1990 SUBJECT: IMMIGRATION BOND B FOIA (b)(6) Receipt Number SND 9006 Date October 3, 1988 I Amount $500.00- G Alien's Name O RODRIGUEZ-Sanchez, R Herminia The conditions of the above-described immigration bond have been fulfilled as to the above-named alien and you are no longer liable under such bond for this alien. The nature of the security accepted on the bond is checked below.
